alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 01 at 3:19AM PST until January 03 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible near beaches and headlands. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast and North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From late Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal communities can expect peak wind gusts on the order of 45 to 55 mph during this event.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
